*p**location_mentioned*monroe */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="02-13-1827">february 13th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr friend*/p*
*p*I recd your much esteemed favours a few Days ago I embrace the oppertunity of *person_mentioned*Mr Charles Hyde*/person_mentioned* gowing out by water to state I am making every exarsition in my power to gett out imadently but so many crosses and Disapointments acur which I Can not cee or prevent that I alomost Dispair at times aded to the reports that is Dayly Coming in respecting the *location_mentioned*Countrey */location_mentioned*which I flater my self is groundless or at least the greatest part of them *person_mentioned*Mr Hide*/person_mentioned* the bearer of this letter is brother to *person_mentioned*Hide */person_mentioned*that gross ows the money two which note I left in the *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*for Colection and gows out with *person_mentioned*Doc Theet (?)*/person_mentioned* for the purpose of getting the money and I request you as a friend to forward him all in your power hee has got the rept for the same I recd from *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* I expect to see you shortley as I am almost ready to start I will then bee able to show you in publieke prints what news is aflot but I hope all will settle Down in peace I have been agood Deal sicke since I Came home owing to my steat of health on my arival as I was almost wore out before I got home there is some intimations aflot that the *location_mentioned*united states*/location_mentioned* has empowered an *person_mentioned*ambasedore */person_mentioned*to treat for that section of the *person_mentioned*Countrey*/person_mentioned* Cotton is almost given nothing and nothing else will Comand money rember mee to your *person_mentioned*Broather */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* I have no news worth stating to I see you which will not bee long and concluded by saying I am yours Cincerly*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Fras Biggam*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Corl F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
